restaurants_bars.name: The Four's
restaurants_bars.description: A sports-themed bar with an extensive memorabilia collection, serving American pub food.

restaurants_bars.name: Tavern in the Square
restaurants_bars.description: Sports bar with big screen TVs and a diverse menu.

accommodations.name: The Boxer
accommodations.description: Boutique, industrial-chic hotel close to the venue.

accommodations.name: Hotel Indigo
accommodations.description: Stylish, modern hotel with close proximity to the venue.

tourist_attractions.name: The Freedom Trail
tourist_attractions.description: A 2.5-mile-long path through downtown Boston that passes by 16 locations significant to the history of the United States.

tourist_attractions.name: Faneuil Hall Marketplace
tourist_attractions.description: Shopping center with many stores and restaurants, located in downtown Boston.

team_related_activities.name: Celtics Fan Experiences
team_related_activities.description: Experience game day in style with official VIP fan experiences, courtside seating, and even play a game on the iconic parquet floor.

options.description: The Massachusetts Bay Transportation Authority operates subway services, including the Orange Line that stops at North Station, adjacent to the venue.
The Massachusetts Bay Transportation Authority operates extensive bus services throughout the city which offer easy access to the venue.
